thread.title: Donna Manning Fleming
thread.title_full: Choosetexaspower reviewed by Donna Manning Fleming

author: Donna Manning Fleming
title: Donna Manning Fleming
text: The agent was very helpful. He explained how a lot of low ball prices would not work for a large user, but only for users who use less than 2000 kw per month.. I would think that energy companies would reward large users with lower rates, but that isn't the case. I was able to lock in a good rate for our type of energy demands.
